title: About Me
text:
With over 12 years of experience in market research and social services, I‚Äôve successfully led various market research and survey projects. These projects honed my skills in quantitative and qualitative research methods, statistical reasoning, and project management.
With a Master‚Äôs degree in Public Administration and a Business Intelligence and Data Analytics Certification, I have a strong understanding of the theoretical foundation of data analysis, which I apply to real-world business problems.
I thrive on turning complex numerical data into meaningful patterns and predictions. My experience includes working with large datasets in research projects, where I utilized R, SPSS, and Tableau to uncover insights that informed strategic decisions. My attention to detail and accuracy has been commended by my supervisors and colleagues alike.
As I transition into the world of data, I am eager to apply my research background to a corporate setting. I am particularly interested in roles that allow me to analyze consumer data to optimize product development and marketing strategies. I am ready to leverage my analytical expertise to make a tangible impact on business growth.
I‚Äôm actively seeking opportunities, and my passion for AI and data science drives my desire to make a meaningful contribution.
I look forward to connecting with new professionals. Feel free to add me on LinkedIn or email me at zarbi786@gmail.com.

title: Abdul Zarbi
text:
I‚Äôm a data analyst and researcher with 10 years of experience transforming complex research data into actionable business insights. I specialize in market research, survey design, and statistical analysis with a proven track record of leading projects that drive strategic decision-making.


With expertise in both quantitative and qualitative research methods, I help organizations understand their markets, customers, and opportunities. My work combines rigorous statistical analysis with clear storytelling to deliver insights that matter.
I‚Äôm currently expanding my expertise into AI and data science, bringing my deep research background into cutting-edge analytics. My goal is to leverage advanced data techniques to optimize product development, enhance marketing strategies, and create measurable business impact.




10+ years of social research and market analysis experience
Expert in turning large dataset into meaningful patterns and predictions
Skilled at building interactive dashboards and compelling data visualizations
Strong project management and stakeholder communication abilities
Passionate about using data to solve real business problems

title: Resume

View Online or Download
You can view my resume below or download the PDF version using the button above.

title: Portfolio
text:
Role: Lead Data Analyst | Duration: 3 months | Year: 2024
Challenge: A humanitarian organization needed to analyze survey data from 5,000+ respondents across multiple regions to assess program effectiveness and inform strategic planning.
Approach: - Designed and implemented comprehensive survey using KoboToolbox - Cleaned and processed data using R and Excel - Created interactive Tableau dashboard for stakeholder presentation - Performed statistical analysis to identify key trends and insights
Tools Used: R, Tableau, KoboToolbox, Excel
Results: - Identified 3 key areas for program improvement, leading to 25% increase in participant satisfaction - Dashboard enabled real-time monitoring for program managers - Findings presented to executive leadership and influenced $2M funding allocation
View Dashboard | Read Full Case Study




Role: Research Analyst | Duration: 2 months | Year: 2023
Challenge: Client needed to understand purchasing patterns and customer segments to optimize marketing strategy.
Approach: - Conducted mixed-methods research (surveys + focus groups) - Analyzed 2,000+ survey responses using statistical modeling - Performed cluster analysis to identify distinct customer segments - Created data visualizations to communicate findings
Tools Used: R, Excel, NVivo, SurveyMonkey
Results: - Identified 4 distinct customer segments with unique preferences - Recommendations led to 15% improvement in campaign conversion rates - Delivered actionable insights for targeted marketing strategy
View Analysis | Download Report




Role: Senior Researcher | Duration: 6 months | Year: 2022
Challenge: Evaluate the impact of a health intervention program across 15 clinics serving 10,000+ patients.
Approach: - Designed pre/post evaluation framework - Collected and analyzed quantitative health outcome data - Conducted qualitative interviews with 50+ beneficiaries - Performed statistical significance testing and regression analysis
Tools Used: R, SPSS, AdvanceMD, ClientTrack, NVivo
Results: - Documented 40% improvement in key health indicators - Findings published in peer-reviewed journal - Program model adopted by 5 additional organizations
Read Publication | View Methodology
